summary: A Brooklyn pier racketeer bullies boat-owners into paying protection money but two fed-up fishermen decide to eliminate the gangster themselves rather than complain to the police.
cast: John Garfield|Ida Lupino|Thomas Mitchell|Eddie Albert|George Tobias|John Qualen|Aline MacMahon|Jerome Cowan|Odette Myrtil|Leo Gorcey|Robert Homans|Bernard Gorcey|Paul Harvey|Murray Alper|Frank Coghlan Jr.|Jimmy Conlin|Alec Craig|Frank Darien|Charles Drake|Jay Eaton|Eddie Graham|Creighton Hale|Herbert Heywood|Max Hoffman Jr.|Richard Kipling|Alexander Leftwich|Frank Mayo|Jack Mower|Mayta Palmera|Barbara Pepper|Konstantin Sankar|Charles Sherlock|Garland Smith|Walter Tetley|Billy Wayne|Charles C. Wilson|Jack Wise
title: Out of the Fog
